text: hashicorp is an infrastructure software
company that enables customers to deploy
faster more secure and more reliably by
utilizing our infrastructure life cycle
management and secure life cycle
management products it is very important
that we understand what our customers
are giving us from a data standpoint
protecting that tagging it and ensuring
that that data is secure at all times
aws organizations allows us to scale our
environment ensure that the protections
are in place by default aws cloud trail
on the other hand allows us to ensure
that we know everything that happens in
AWS allows us to retroactively
investigate if needed and most
importantly monitor for malicious
activity in our environment aws config
allows us to know what is deployed where
and how it changes over time allowing us
to reflect back if needed to understand
how did this one thing change our
mission with AWS is to simplify hybrid
and cloud deployments through our tools
like
Terraform HCP Hashgrip Cloud Platform
Vault aws organizations cloud trail and
config are key to our success in our
compliance journey without them it would
be much harder to achieve what we've
been able to achieve through our
compliance roadmap our collaboration
with AWS means the world to our
customers we enable them to deploy
faster securely and have repeatable
patterns that ideally improve their life
in the cloud and in any multicloud
strategy that they deploy
[Music]
